General.Name: UE Furniture Co Ltd
General.Description: UE Furniture Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of healthy seats in China and Internationally. The company offers office chairs, sofas, massage chairs, leisure chairs, lift tables, and other healthy furniture. It also offers its products online. UE Furniture Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Huzhou, China.
General.Address: No.1 Yongyi West Road, Huzhou, China
